title: Using the Inverse Power Rule to Expand
text: We can use the power rule as follows. We know that the exponent that $$\log_{b}\left(M^n\right)=n\log_{b}\left(M\right)$$. In this case, $$M=4$$ and $$n=2$$. So, $$2\log_{3}\left(4\right)=\log_{3}\left(4^2\right)=\log_{3}\left(16\right)$$

In this case,    m is equal to 4  and  n, is equal to, 2 . So, , 2 the log base 3 of 4 is equal to the log base 3 of, parentheses 4 squared  is equal to, the log base 3 of 16
